content:
1. The key to getting clients results is to shift their mindset and identity.
2. Many coaches focus on the steps between point A and point B, but forget about the mindset shift.
3. The transformation happens in the mindset and identity, not just information.
4. To get results, ask what kind of person gets these results by default and what identity they need to adopt.
5. Shifting the mindset and identity helps clients believe they can achieve the result.
6. The secret to getting results is shifting the mindset before sharing the method.
7. A coaching program should focus on what type of person they need to be before what they need to do.
8. Getting results is important for coaches to build credibility and attract clients.
9. The best marketing tool is to focus on getting clients results and help them achieve their goals.
10. Word of mouth will pick up when clients see results.
11. Getting results is not just about knowing the steps, but also the mindset shifts and identity changes.
12. Courtney Sanders is a full-time online life and business coach, wife, and mom.
13. She incorporates her life coaching experience into her business coaching for better results.
14. To learn more about building a coaching business, sign up for the next big name bootcamp.
15. Follow Courtney Sanders on her podcast, YouTube, and Instagram for more information.
